dict.acceptation: 给…看；表现出；显露出；上演；
被人看见，显现，显而易见；

sent.orig: The photograph, song, plain announcing you establish an article. SHOW produce the real ego!
sent.trans: 发布你的照片，歌曲，原创文章。SHOW出真自我！

sent.orig: The Sydney Garden &Flower Show - This annual horticultural show will educate, impress and amaze.
sent.trans: 悉尼花园与花表演-这年度园艺的表演将教育，打动并且惊奇。

sent.orig: Today, we will have a fashion show. Now, Let's watch a fashion show.
sent.trans: 今天，我们来开一个服装展示会。现在，我们先来看一段服装表演。

sent.orig: Show me not the meat but show me the man.
sent.trans: 不用看食物，看本人就行。

sent.orig: I'm going to show you something that I don't show many people.
sent.trans: 我要给你看点东西我没给几个人看过。
